//Detail Pages DETAILS PAGE //Detail Car DETAIL CAR SERVICE Make a booking for us, we will wait you at our shop prepared to wash your car to the cleanest. 

 Operating Hour: 9am to 11am, 
 1pm to 6pm 

 Price: Basic Cleaning 10 to 20 according to car size 

 Full Cleaning including waxing : 
 Below RM100
//Detail Motorcycle DETAIL MOTORCYCLE SERVICE Make a booking for us, we will wait you at our shop prepared to wash your motorcycle to the cleanest. 

 Operating Hour: 9am to 11am, 
 1pm to 6pm 

 Price: Basic Cleaning 10 to 20 according to motorcycle size 

 Full Cleaning including waxing : 
 Below RM50
//Detail House DETAIL HOUSE SERVICE Make a booking for us, we will go to your place and our shop will clean your house to the cleanest. 

 Operating Hour: 9am to 11am, 
 1pm to 6pm 

 Price: Basic Cleaning 10 to 20 according to house size

 Below RM200
